message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $120. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your time, but I'm not willing to pay $120. I was thinking more along the lines of $90. It's a great product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $90 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $105.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $97.50. Can you consider that?
